member.name: M:DAY4.EmployeeSearch.#ctor(DTypes.Employee[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified employees array.
member.param: An array of Employee objects to initialize the EmployeeSearch instance.
member.exception: Thrown if the employees array is null.

member.name: P:DAY4.EmployeeSearch.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets or sets the value at the specified id in the Employees array.
member.param: The ID of the specific employee.
member.returns: The data of the employee if it exists.
member.exception: Thrown when the specified ID does not exist.

member.name: P:DAY4.EmployeeSearch.Item(DTypes.HDate)
member.summary: Gets or sets the value at the specified hiring date of the employee the Employees array.
member.param: The hiring date of the specific employee.
member.returns: The data of the employee if it exists.
member.exception: Thrown when the specified hiring date does not exist.

member.name: P:DAY4.EmployeeSearch.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets or sets the value at the specified name in the Employees array.
member.param: The name of the specific employee.
member.returns: The data of the employee if it exists.
member.exception: Thrown when the specified name does not exist.
